languages.text: "И да, и нет. Таро Императора направило меня сюда, поведало о беде, скрывающейся в святилище. Но дальше… кровавая тропа, небрежно протоптанная налетчиками, откроет истину".

traits.locale_text: "И да, и нет. Таро Императора направило меня сюда, поведало о беде, скрывающейся в святилище. Но дальше… кровавая тропа, небрежно протоптанная налетчиками, откроет истину".

languages.text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
languages.original_text: "И да, и нет. Таро Императора направило меня сюда, поведало о беде, скрывающейся в святилище. Но дальше… кровавая тропа, небрежно протоптанная налетчиками, откроет истину".

traits.locale_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
"The Emperor's Tarot only guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the sanctuary. And now the tracks left carelessly by the raiders tell their own story."
"Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
"The Emperor's Tarot merely guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the sanctuary. These tracks, left so carelessly by the raiders, tell their own story."
"Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
"Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
"Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

languages.text: "Ja und nein. Sein Tarot hat mich geführt und mir von dem Bösen erzählt, das im Schrein lauerte. Aber abgesehen davon ... der blutige Pfad, den die Plünderer leichtfertig beschritten haben, wird die Wahrheit offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Ja und nein. Sein Tarot hat mich geführt und mir von dem Bösen erzählt, das im Schrein lauerte. Aber abgesehen davon ... der blutige Pfad, den die Plünderer leichtfertig beschritten haben, wird die Wahrheit offenbaren."

languages.text: «Sí y no. Su tarot me ha guiado hasta aquí tras revelarme que la maldad acechaba en el templo. Pero, más allá de eso... el camino ensangrentado que los asaltantes recorren con descaro revelará la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Sí y no. Su tarot me ha guiado hasta aquí tras revelarme que la maldad acechaba en el templo. Pero, más allá de eso... el camino ensangrentado que los asaltantes recorren con descaro revelará la verdad».

languages.text: 「はい、と同時に、いいえです。陛下のタロットは、ただ我をここに導き、神殿に潜む邪悪なものを教えてくださった。ですがその先のことは…レイダーたちが油断して残した血塗れの道が、真実を明かしてくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、と同時に、いいえです。陛下のタロットは、ただ我をここに導き、神殿に潜む邪悪なものを教えてくださった。ですがその先のことは…レイダーたちが油断して残した血塗れの道が、真実を明かしてくれるでしょう」

languages.text: “既是，又不是。是祂的圣牌指引我来到这里，让我看到了潜伏在圣殿之中的邪恶。但在这之后……那些粗心大意的劫掠者留下来的血迹，让我看到了真相。”
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

traits.locale_text: “既是，又不是。是祂的圣牌指引我来到这里，让我看到了潜伏在圣殿之中的邪恶。但在这之后……那些粗心大意的劫掠者留下来的血迹，让我看到了真相。”

languages.text: « Oui et non. Son tarot m'a guidée ici et m'a révélé le mal qui hante le sanctuaire. Mais au-delà de ça... la piste de sang que les pillards ont maladroitement laissée derrière eux nous montrera la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Oui et non. Son tarot m'a guidée ici et m'a révélé le mal qui hante le sanctuaire. Mais au-delà de ça... la piste de sang que les pillards ont maladroitement laissée derrière eux nous montrera la vérité. »

languages.text: "Hem evet hem de hayır. O'nun Tarotu, beni buraya yönlendirdi ve mabette kötülüğün kol gezdiğini söyledi. Ancak bunun ötesinde... Baskıncıların dikkatsizce arşınladığı kana bulanan yol, hakikate ışık tutacak."
languages.original_text: "Yes and no. His Tarot guided me here and told me of the evil that lurked in the shrine. But beyond that... the bloody path carelessly tread by the raiders will reveal the truth."
